name: Pony Dress Up Game for Girls - Create Your Mermaid
name_original: Pony Dress Up Game for Girls - Create Your Mermaid
description:
Rumor has it in Mermaid city that the annual cute pony contest will be next week. You quickly check on the Internet only to see that this is indeed true. You have only seven days to match up against the city’s most fashionable ponies!!!

Pony Mermaid Dress Up puts you in a situation where you can show your fashion and dress up your own unique and unbelievably sweet Mermaid pony. Only in this way you can achieve a version that is fitting for a winner in the city’s best pony contest.

Get your groove on and put that fashion taste and creativity into good use. Create the cutest little Pony Mermaid with the most outstanding and fashionable clothes and accessories.

------ How to Play ------


Pony Mermaid Dress up has a simple and fun gameplay. You can dress up your little pony by customizing every piece of clothing and accessory. The game is rich on customization so you can achieve whatever fashion ideas you have in mind.

You can customise your pony’s hair, head accessory, dress, necklace and environment.

The game is free to play. You can however pay a small fee to have specific pony models , as well as high class accessories or pieces of clothing unlocked.

What are you waiting for? Download Now!!
